Class ModelManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • common.mediator.ModelManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ModelManagerInterface, java.io.Serializable

    public class ModelManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements ModelManagerInterface, java.io.Serializable
    Class that serves as the role of ModelManager - to access the database and establish connection to it.
